name: chronology
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the order in which a series of events happened, or a list or explanation of these events in the order in which they happened: I'm not sure of the chronology of events.

a list or explanation of events in the order in which they happened: He gave a detailed chronology of the events of the past three days. chronological adjective us
